parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post contains a CMF number (CMF 11240002) at the end. This strongly suggests it is electoral propaganda, as CMF numbers are used for tracking and reporting campaign finance.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>While the post doesn't explicitly mention a specific candidate's name, it is clearly associated with the PNL (Partidul Național Liberal) Botosani Municipal Organization.  This implicitly refers to all candidates running for office under the PNL banner in Botosani.  Therefore, Article 36 (7) - a applies.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform.  The targeting data shows a wide geographical reach across multiple cities and counties in Romania, indicating it is intended for a broad audience, not just personal communication. Therefore, it addresses the wide population.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The post's message ("Agriculture. The engine of Botosani County! #continuămSchimbarea") aims to promote the PNL's positive impact on agriculture in Botosani. This is clearly intended to influence voters to support the PNL in the upcoming elections. The hashtag "#continuămSchimbarea" (Let's continue the change) further reinforces this electoral objective. Therefore, Article 36 (7) - c applies.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post is not journalistic in nature. While it touches upon a relevant topic (agriculture), it lacks the objectivity and neutrality expected of journalistic reporting. It is promotional in tone and clearly serves an electoral purpose.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a carefully crafted message designed to promote the PNL and influence voters' choices in the election.  The use of a paid Facebook advertisement further supports this conclusion.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1517892218924770</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post, paid for by the PNL Botosani Municipal Organization, contains a CMF number, directly links to the PNL, targets a wide geographical area, and uses messaging clearly designed to promote the party and influence voters.  The post's objective is to positively associate the PNL with agricultural progress in Botosani, thereby encouraging voters to support them.  The presence of the CMF number, the targeting data, and the explicitly promotional nature of the message all point towards a violation.  There are no counterarguments to suggest otherwise.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>All PNL candidates in Botosani</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PNL</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
PNL Botosani - Organizatia Municipala, pentru incalcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook cu ID-ul 1517892218924770, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024,  cu mesajul "Agricultura. Motorul județului Botoșani! #continuămSchimbarea CMF 11240002",  care constituie propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea perioadei de campanie.  Reclama, cu un buget sub 100 RON, a vizat o audiență extinsă în județul Botoșani și județele învecinate, având ca efect electoral promovarea imaginii PNL și influențarea votului în favoarea candidaților săi. Prezența numărului CMF confirmă natura electorală a reclamei.  Contactul advertiserului este ionut.voicu.bt@gmail.com și +40756823832.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
